subject: Re: File Uploads
preview: Hi Nicollette, These PDF's are not linked to the public website, so unless you have the link to the pdf(s), you won't be able to find them. However, Google may over time find the link as part of its

full_threads.body:
Hi Nicollette, 

These PDF's are not linked to the public website, so unless you have the link to the pdf(s), you won't be able to find them. 

However, Google may over time find the link as part of its normal data scanning processes. There is no way to stop this other than putting them behind a password-protected firewall. 

Your best option may be to upload them to DropBox/Google Drive, as those sites are designed for such purposes. You are trying to use the website for something that it is not intended for... The website is designed to rank well in Google etc. and is not locked off to the public.

I hope this helps.
@joel we might need your help with this. Client asking for the uploaded files to be hidden from the public.

Hi Rica,

Thank you, but I would like to confirm that this is all hidden and not on the website ?



Warm Regards,

Nicollette Papas

Can you please upload these files onto the website (hidden - one for each broker) and send me the links?  Preferably something easy to identify that has the broker’s name in the link somewhere so we don’t mix them up?

Emily
